message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think it's a great deal for something you'll find valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $95 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I still can't go above $100 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know if we can agree on this.
